data.text:
Don't miss the semi-annual Demand Gen Summit happening tomorrow! The Demand Gen Summit is an online event where thousands of marketing and sales professional have come together to hear from hundreds of experts on how to Drive, Engage and Close Demand. This year they've added AI in Demand Gen as a fourth speaking track. This is among the best speaking line up we've had for this event. The keynote will be presented by our friends at Demandbase with CMO, Kelly Hopping and CRO John Eitel. I'll mention a few more incredible speakers from industry leading organizations you can expect to hear from: - Timothy (Tim) Hughes ÊèêÂßÜ¬∑‰ºëÊñØ L.ISP, CEO & Co-founder of DLA ignite - Kris Rudeegraap, CEO of Sendoso - Mark Kilens, CEO and Co-Founder of Tack - David Dulany, CEO and Founder of Tenbound - Mia Umanos, CEO of Clickvoyant (Techstars '22) - Amarpreet Kalkat, CEO and Founder of Humantic AI - Daniel Priestley, Founder of DENT - Lianna Kinard, CMO of The Buckner Company - Thomas Helfrich, CEO of Instantly Relevant - Vladimir Blagojeviƒá, Co-Founder of Fullfunnel.io - Christopher Engman, Co-Founder of Megadeals - Jonathan Bland and ‚úåüèªJason S., Founders of Omni Lab - üìøJudd Borakoveüìø, Chief Growth Officer of GTM Partners - üé§ Renata Centuri√≥n, MBA, Managing Partner of Winning by Design - üî∂üî∏Mason Cosbyüî∏üî∂, Founder of Scrappy ABM - Garrett Mehrguth, CEO of Directive - Julianne S Martin, MBA, CMO of Above The Fold - Mariah West, VP of Marketing at ViB - Jeremy Sporn, President of Royce Brook Media - Matthew Ward, Managing Director at Boston Consulting Group (BCG) -Scott Rhodes, Associate Director at Boston Consulting Group I hope you can make some time tomorrow to join me at this event. All live presentations will be broadcast on LinkedIn, YouTube and on demandgensummit . com #digitalmarketing #innovation #ai

Last week, I was honored to be a part of Signals' 6th semi-annual Demand Gen Summit. It was an incredible experience to share the stage with industry leaders such as Godard Abel, CEO of G2, Gabe Rogol, CEO of Demandbase, and Kris Rudeegraap, CEO of Sendoso. These guys are industry luminaries! During the event, we delved into captivating discussions about the current economy, emerging demand generation trends, and the strategic utilization of AI for companies. We explored key strategies that can thrust organizations ahead of their competition. For those who couldn't attend, I'm excited to share the link to the keynote presentation, on-demand, in the comments section. I invite you to watch it and kindly share your thoughts or any questions you may have in the comments below. Your perspectives are invaluable to me. #innovation #ai #digitalmarketing

Join me and these industry powerhouse CEOs at Signals's Demand Gen Summit for our Round Table Keynote on May 17th! I'll be joined by - Gabe Rogol, CEO of Demandbase - Godard Abel, CEO of G2 - Kris Rudeegraap, CEO of Sendoso You can expect to hear us discuss: üìä Current trends üí∏ The economy ü´® Potential pitfalls to avoid and be aware of ü§ñ AI and how to leverage it in your business ‚òÑÔ∏èOpportunities you don't want to pass by...and so much more We'll be live on May 17th around 9:15 AM PST. Harvard Business Review LinkedIn LinkedIn News VentureBeat Bloomberg News MarketWatch Financial Times The Wall Street Journal The Economist Money Buzz! Time Inc. NerdWallet TheStreet The Verge WIRED Engadget Gizmodo.com ReadWrite Microsoft Research CNET Forbes GigaOm Buffer HubSpot Sprout Insight, LLC Boston Consulting Group (BCG) Crunchy Tech Utah Tech University Brigham Young University Growth Hackers Digital Entrepreneur Media Salesforce #digitalmarketing #ai #business #innovation

Get ready to be blown away with this years Silicon Slopes Summit ... it's going to be mind-blowing! It will be on Sept 27- 28 at the Delta Center. This year's speaker lineup is nothing short of amazing. These are CEOs who have achieved incredible success in their careers, but they're not stopping there. They're using their success to inspire and empower others to reach their own full potential. You'll hear from the best of the best, the ones who have blazed the trail and are now leading the way for others to follow and I can't wait to hear from each of these amazing leaders. In no particular order, here is the speaker line-up: Jessica Sibley, CEO of TIME James Pitaro, Chairman at ESPN Pam Murphy, CEO of Imperva Jim Lanzone, CEO of Yahoo Prashanth Chandrasekar, CEO of Stack Overflow Chris Hyams, CEO & Board Director of Indeed.com Gary Vaynerchuk, CEO of VaynerMedia Ed Bastian, CEO of Delta Air Lines Max Levchin, Founder & CEO of Affirm Will Grannis, CTO of Google Cloud So if you're ready to be inspired, motivated, and empowered to achieve your own visions, mark your calendars for September 27th-28th, 2023. This is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to learn from the very best, to connect with like-minded individuals, and to be a part of something truly incredible. Don't miss out on this amazing event! #motivation #inspiration #personaldevelopment

Exciting news from Signals! The leading provider of Signal Marketing AI solutions has just announced the appointment of three veteran tech leaders to their advisory board. Gabe Larsen, Head of B2B Marketing at Meta, Rick Tolman, VP of Global Demand Generation at Salesforce, and Mark Maughan, Chief Analytics Officer, SVP Customer Success at Domo, Inc., will be bringing their years of experience to help drive Signals' continued growth in the Signal Marketing field. I've know each of these individuals for several years, they are rockstars! With their unique set of skills and perspectives, these new advisory board members are expected to be vital in driving the company forward .... super excited to have them on the team. You can check out the full press release here üëâhttps://lnkd.in/g3VhGaAb #innovation #technology #ai
